title: Cyber Metal: Your Stolen Rage
description: We expressed the Cyber Metal rage they stole from you with 20 different songs.
longDescription:
Your Stolen Rage is a 20-song album we have composed, blending electronic and metal music genres with distinct structures yet shared emotions. If you enjoy EDM and Metal Music, you may also enjoy this content. The album is compiled from mix videos we have uploaded on YouTube.


The song titles and their corresponding videos are listed below (please note that not all songs from the videos are included in this package):


PREVIEW (1st Mix Video)


  1. Industrial Prophet
  2. Disintegrate The Night
  3. Returnal
  4. Vengeance
  5. Insurrection
  6. Flame's Grief
  7. Djentle Task Force
  8. For Your Horns
  9. Cryo-Mechanics


PREVIEW (2nd Mix Video)


  1. Cyclone
  2. Divine Showcase
  3. Thorium
  4. Alternation
  5. Purgatory
  6. Against The Colossus (known as "Against All")
  7. Assembly


PREVIEW (3rd Mix Video)


  1. Tainted Rave
  2. Convocation
  3. Cell's Domain (known as "Biomass")
  4. The Crystal


We upload various types of music on YouTube regularly. Don't forget to follow us; we are actively composing:


https://www.youtube.com/@intersonicsound


Attention!


The package contents do not include tempo (BPM) information for the songs. Loop versions of the songs are not available.

technicalDetails:
You can email us with new ideas and opinions, technical questions, corrections or inquiries, or even just to chat. Your feedback enhances the value of every product you purchase, and we consider it important.


FAQ


Can I use your products in my commercial projects without any restrictions?

Yes, absolutely! You can use them in all kinds of content, including films, games, or YouTube videos, even for commercial purposes.


Will there be a problem if I upload a video to YouTube that contains music from Intersonic Sound?

No, it won't. The products are not registered with Content ID and are structured to not claim rights. You will not receive a copystrike warning for your channel.


Do you update your products?

There are products that we have updated and will continue to update. We may not update all of them, but the likelihood of us adding new content to your purchased product as a free update is very high.


What file format do you use?

We prefer 24-bit WAV files. If the package size becomes too large, we might consider 16-bit WAV, but we have not done this yet. For now, we have processed every product as a 24-bit WAV.
